name: Border of life
description:
Help Youmu find the way to the netherwold while Yuyuko tries to find her way out of there. Will they meet at the border, between the worlds of life and death?

Collect all the spirits in each level to go to the next one.

Press Z as Youmu to dash.

Yuyuko can float for a bit before falling.

R - reset player position

F1 - show/hide cursor

v1.1 changelog:

- Fixed mouse cursor not locked in game window

- Fixed dialog stuck on screen

- Added platform in level 4 to make the level beatable without dying
